item.title: Welcome
item.description: What’s new?Welcome to the brand new Cloudflare for Teams documentation. Starting on February 8, 2021, this space will replace the separate, independent documentation for: Cloudflare Access Cloudflare Gateway Cloudflare Tunnel WARP client for Teams ​‚Äã The new structure The new Cloudflare for Teams documentation is structured around six main topics: Topic Description üèóÔ∏è Documentation on setting up Teams This section covers how to set up the Teams dashboard External link icon Open external link .

item.title: Get started
item.description: Get startedWelcome to Cloudflare Zero Trust. This guide covers the main steps you need to take to set up your Zero Trust environment. ​‚Äã Prerequisites A Cloudflare account ​‚Äã Start from the Cloudflare dashboard On your Account Home in the Cloudflare dashboard External link icon Open external link , click on the Zero Trust icon. On the onboarding screen, choose a team name. Complete your onboarding by selecting a subscription plan and entering your payment details.

item.title: Any valid service token
item.description: The request will need to present the headers for any service token created for this account.

item.title: Authentication method
item.description: Allow access based on the “amr” identifier.

item.title: Azure¬Æ Group
item.description: Allow members of an Azure Group. The ID is the group UUID (id) in Azure.

item.title: Common name
item.description: The request will need to present a valid certificate with an expected common name.
